channel.title: I need help!
channel.description: i am very new to coding and i need someone to tell me how to make and add commands. please someone, help me.

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

Go into your Client.Java (or the notepad) and hold “Ctrl+F” and type a command you know from that server and do not use the ::'s only put the name of it and you should see something like this - if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("CMD")

Under it after you see the “{” hit enter until your one line away from that letter, add this after that -

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("your CMD") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(Item ID number, 1); sendMessage("Your message"); }

Make sure the command under it is spaced to.

That is for item commands. after you have added it save it and then compile it.
If you get an error search for that new command you entered and try looking over my instructions.
You can add more items by clicking at the end of the line addItem(ITEM ID number, 1);
Just hit enter and type this addItem(ITEM ID, 1);
Also where it says Item ID jsut put the number of the item you want there.

Also where it says player rights and how it has a “0” 0 is for regular players and up can use it if you put a 1 moderators and up can use the command and 2 for admin and up and 3 for owner and up “3” is as high as it gets so don’t put anything higher than 3.

Read full topic
